#Downloads Downloads [COLOR blue]Show[/COLOR] Folder: [COLOR red]Movie[/COLOR] Folder: Enable ContextMenuItem: Downloading? Enable ContextMenuItem: Show URL?
#MetaArt View Modes View-Mode: - Default - View-Mode: List of Movies View-Mode: List of Shows View-Mode: Episodes View-Mode: Sources View-Mode: Favorites
#Plugin Plugin Enable Debugging? (where available) Show Information for Debugging (where available) Download current Master branch ZIP of this plugin. Clear [COLOR tan]Favorites[/COLOR]. Enable ContextMenuItem: Clear [COLOR tan]Favorites[/COLOR]?
#MetaArt Metadata Clear [COLOR tan]Metadata[/COLOR].
#Account Account Username: Password: Use Account info? (Not Available)
